subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, Henrik Stenson grabbed the biggest victory of his career, defeating Geoff Ogilvy, 2 and 1, in the 36-hole final of the Accenture Match Play Championship.
snippet: On Sunday, Henrik Stenson grabbed the biggest victory of his career, defeating Geoff Ogilvy, 2 and 1, in the 36-hole final of the Accenture Match Play Championship.
